title: Anybody know where information about-
body:
Does anyone know where information is about season 7(6) jungle?
Info about how much gold they give, EXP and so on.

That info will be great thanks.

replies.body:
No Wiki is ever 100% reliable.
But I've found this website very useful over the years, here is the page on the jungle monsters:

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Monster

there is a list of monsters at the bottom of the page.
I haven't checked all of them, but the Krugs look like they have been updated for season 7.

I used to think so, but it always told me that Taliyah's Q would proc Rylai's 40% slow.
But Marauder just showed me that it was only ever 20%.... 

and now i have trust issues...

xD _(I still use it every day)_
